content: अपमृत्युः [अपकृष्टो दुष्टहेतुजन्यत्वेन मृत्युः] {@--1@} Sudden or untimely death, accidental or unnatural death; भर्तृसक्तोऽपमृत्युस्तस्य संचरति <ls>Pt. 4.</ls> {@--2@} Any great danger, illness &c. from which a person, hopelessly given up for lost, recovers, quite contrary to expectation.
